name: denyhosts
long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Recipe for installing and configuring denyhosts package. 

= REQUIREMENTS:

Ruby for unban-ip script

= ATTRIBUTES: 

No attributes.

= USAGE:

Include denyhosts recipe to install default denyhosts package and a ruby script that unbans ip addresses from denyhosts service
